issue.title: [CF 237] Add hunter's "Wing Clip" spell to "Slowed" group of debuffs
issue.body:
Please add hunter's spell "Wing Clip" to "Slowed" debuff group.

I forgot it when I provided spells for this group.

http://www.wowhead.com/spell=2974

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user algus2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #237 | Raw
